description: This file defines a team-based system for gathering company information using various AI agents and tools, with logging hooks for monitoring function execution times.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent with specific roles, models, tools, and instructions.

classes.name: Team
classes.description: Represents a team of agents with coordination instructions and members.

methods.name: logger_hook
methods.description: A hook function that logs execution time of other functions and specific task transfers.
